changes.change: Your public profile is now more easily accessible when you're logged in under the "My profile" option. This replaces the "My routes" option which redirected to the home page.
Moved a set of relics in the first room to the correct pack (the room that everyone skips with Night Fae - thanks Omicron)
Mouse cursors with an image in shared route editing are now always displayed as a circle, instead of a square if the user uploaded a square image.
Changing enemy visual type will no longer always revert back to portrait enemy visual type when changing floors.

If you try to clone your route to a specific team (using the Clone to Team dropdown option) the displayed modal no longer has too little space to select your team if you're a member of more than 2 teams. It's been reworked and now displays all teams you're a part of properly.

[Hotfixed] Deleting a dungeonroute now also deletes any existing live sessions for that route. Visiting a live session of a deleted route will now show a 404 not found because of this, instead of causing a crash.
Create route button is no longer disabled after closing the modal and re-opening it (thanks Omicron).
Hovering your mouse over the enemy forces while viewing/editing a route now always shows the correct tooltip (thanks Jaxeek).
Route info while viewing a route now works again when you click it.
[Hotfixed] Migrating a route to encrypted which kills enemies which have since been deleted from the mapping no longer causes a crash.
[Hotfixed] MDT Importer could crash if a non-supported week was found in the import string.
